title: Our Heartfelt Message
block2: First, FPT Telecom International Co., Ltd. (FTI) would like to send you our best wishes and warmest regards.
block3: FTI was founded on April 24, 2008 as a subsidiary of FPT Telecom JSC, with a strong wish to become a new leading organization with creative efforts in science and technology, utmost customer satisfaction, contribution to national prosperity, along with the best material and spiritual conditions for our members to develop their talents.
block4: With that wish, on our 30 journey accompanying the development of domestic information technology, FPT always aims to achieve customer satisfaction through excellent services, products and technological solutions. Therefore, FPT is constantly researching and pioneering trends in technology, contributing to affirm Vietnamâ€™s position on the international technology map. We hope that with our fortes and outstanding potentials, our Customers will always feel a sense of trust and contentment when experiencing services at FPT.
